BARTENDER.notes: Appears in 1 scenes with 2 lines of dialogue

BOUNCER.notes: Appears in 1 scenes with 2 lines of dialogue

CROWD.notes: Appears in 1 scenes with 1 lines of dialogue

DANNY.notes: Appears in 1 scenes with 8 lines of dialogue

DE-FI DOM.notes: Appears in 3 scenes with 12 lines of dialogue

HANNAH.notes: Appears in 6 scenes with 58 lines of dialogue

MATT.notes: Appears in 1 scenes with 8 lines of dialogue

PATRICK.notes: Appears in 2 scenes with 17 lines of dialogue

ROGER.notes: Appears in 1 scenes with 31 lines of dialogue

scenes.content:
OVER BLACK --

            “INSPIRIT” BY JULIANA BARWICK plays over an empty void. This
            song is ethereal, angelic, transcendent.


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         Fact... One percent of investors
                         own eighty-seven percent of the
                         wealth. And no, I’m not talking
                         about the stock market; I’m talking
                         about crypto.

            FADE IN:

The view of our home two hundred and thirty-eight thousand
            miles away is majestic, peaceful, serene.


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         Welcome to the metaverse. The
                         single most important evolution in
                         technology since the invention of
                         the wheel. The greatest re-
                         distribution of wealth in human
                         history. A time unlike any other,
                         where the little guy will finally
                         get a piece of the pie... That’s
                         the pitch, anyway.

            As we push in on Planet Earth, a precipitous montage of
            significant global events unfolds. We see the truth. Our

            truth. The reality of our world as we know it.

                                                          BEGIN MONTAGE.


            The flooding of Pakistan. Hurricane Katrina. An emaciated
            polar bear takes its last breath. Vladimir Putin shakes hands
            with Donald Trump. The Tiananmen Square massacre.


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         But what all this clickbait PR
                         really means is the already rich
                         are just fleecing the perpetual
                         poor. A techno-feudal Ponzi scheme
                         where somebody wins and everybody
                         else can fuck right off.

            Girls protest in Iran. Proud Boys storm the Capitol. The
            World Trade Center is attacked. Princess Diana is laid to
            rest. Oil fields are on fire in Iraq. Rodney King is beaten.


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         And in this scorched-earth
                         hellscape of economic catastrophe,
                         stripped bare by the boomer
                         generation, you're either of two
                         people -- the one cheating,
                         scamming, screwing over your
                         friends or the one getting screwed.
                         Either way, we’re doomed.

            We witness the stripping of the Amazon Rainforest. Columbine
            school shooting. Troops in Afghanistan. The women’s rights
            march. The slaughter of citizens in Myanmar. The war in
            Ukraine. The Arab Spring. The 2009 economic collapse.


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         The metaverse... A pyramid scheme
                         for twenty-something kleptocrats. A
                         Discord circle jerk of crypto bros
                         getting off on multibillion-dollar
                         grifts. It’s like a shit casino in
                         Old Town Vegas with cheap vodka
                         drinks and penny slots, and
                         everyone who can count cards is
                         there.
                         Dan Bilzerian jet skis. Jeff Bezos
                         emerges from his
                         spaceship. Elon Musk smokes weed on
                         the Joe Rogan Podcast.

            The Antarctic ice shelf collapses into the ocean.


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         And when the world’s largest multi-
                         level marketing scheme takes a
                         dump, someone’s gonna be left
                         holding the bags...

            THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC: Hoarding toilet paper. Protesting
            masks. Refusing to get vaccinated. Loved ones saying goodbye
            to their dying family members via FaceTime.
            Over 1.5 million deaths in America...


                                      HANNAH (V.O.)
                         All I know is, it’s not gonna be
                         me.

            A nuclear bomb ignites. Blinding white light consumes the
            screen.

            SUPER TITLE: W.A.G.M.I.

                                                                FADE TO:
scenes.heading: EXT. PLANET EARTH - PRESENT DAY

scenes.content:
It’s a second-floor closet above a dim sum restaurant
            somewhere in Chinatown. You can hear the rats squabbling in
            the plaster walls.

            WORK DESK

            Surrounded by stolen COMPUTER EQUIPMENT, HANNAH (24), a
            disaffected, rebellious MIT dropout, is intensely focused on
            soldering a microchip inside a GOLD PRADA WRISTBAND.

            ANGLE ON: HANNAH’s LAPTOP streams the DE-FI DOM YOUTUBE


            CHANNEL. (We will meet DE-FI DOM IRL later on.)


                                      DE-FI DOM (O.S.)
                         ...We’re gonna be catching up with
                         PATRICK Weiss, founder of T-Rex. So
                         smash that like button, click
                         subscribe if you wanna get in
                         before everyone else...

            HANNAH examines the Prada wristband. It’s complete.

            CLOTHING RACK

            HANNAH thumbs through one DESIGNER OUTFIT after another.
            GUCCI, CHANEL, DIOR. She selects TOM FORD.

            WALL MIRROR

            HANNAH applies lipstick and a smokey eye. She’s flawless in
            her execution. Clasps the Prada bracelet around her wrist.
            Picks up her iPhone. Turns the camera onto --

            PHONE CAM POV:

            Her bracelet and immaculate manicure sparkles in frame.


                                      HANNAH (O.C.)
                         Today’s self-care moment was
                         brought to you by Prada...


            END PHONE CAM POV.


            HANNAH posts the VIDEO. Presses play on her Spotify. Sips
            wine.


            PRE-LAP: HANNAH’S SONG OF THE SUMMER kicks in --
scenes.heading: INT. HANNAH’S WORKSPACE - NEW YORK CITY - NIGHT

scenes.content:
Instead of H&M and Zara banners, NFT APES, ZOMBIES and ANIME
            CATS populate the digital billboards. A giant AD for NFT NYC
            takes over the center square.
scenes.heading: EXT. TIMES SQUARE - NEW YORK CITY - NIGHT

scenes.content:
HANNAH’S SUMMER SONG continues throughout the club.

            Buzzing lasers and raver-clad DANCERS spinning TECHNICOLORED
            HULA HOOPS frame a giant LED SCREEN animating poorly-rendered
            CRYPTO ART.

            HANNAH scans the madhouse of CRYPTO BROS, and E-GIRLS. Her
            intense focus is unbroken by the MECHANICAL BULL revving into
            action, bucking off one douchebag after another.

            DE-FI DOM (25), slicked hair and a slippery charisma,
            YouTube’s biggest crypto influencer, hovers next to the DIPLO
            LOOK-ALIKE DJ. He grabs the mic.


                                      DE-FI DOM
                         NEW YORK CITY! Everyone having a
                         good time?

                                      CROWD
                         Yeah!

                                      DE-FI DOM
                         Let’s celebrate this guy over here
                         for making it happen. The OG
                         himself...
                         DE-FI DOM points to PATRICK WEISS
                         (30s), trust-funder turned
                         crypto billionaire. Don’t be fooled
                         by this guy’s heart-
                         melting smile; dark triad is an
                         understatement.
                         DE-FI DOM (CONT’D)
                         PATRICK Weiss is in the house!
                         HANNAH locks on PATRICK as he waves
                         to the star-struck crowd.
scenes.heading: INT. NIGHTCLUB - NEW YORK CITY - NIGHT

scenes.content:
PATRICK and his entourage head up the stairs to the VIP
            lounge. HANNAH follows but is stopped by the BOUNCER.


                                      HANNAH
                         I’m with him.

                                      BOUNCER
                         Don’t look like it to me.
                         HANNAH rolls her smokey cat eyes.
                         She’s outta there.
scenes.heading: INT. NIGHTCLUB - VIP LOUNGE ENTRANCE - MOMENTS LATER

scenes.content:
PATRICK is surrounded by a hoard of SYCOPHANTS and E-GIRLS
            mooching free CHAMPAGNE. He wraps his arm around DE-FI DOM.


                                      PATRICK
                         Got some alpha about T-Rex Finance
                         becoming an exchange.

                                      DE-FI DOM
                         When?

                                      PATRICK
                         After the utility token hypes on
                         your channel. In six months we’re
                         gonna make Binance look like a
                         clown show. I got New York.

                                      DE-FI DOM
                         How the hell did you get New York?

                                      PATRICK
                         Check your wallet.
                         Dom pulls out his PHONE. Opens up
                         his DIGITAL WALLET. A LOT
                         of Bitcoin just dropped in his
                         account.
                         PATRICK (CONT’D)
                         That enough?

                                      DE-FI DOM
                         It’s a start. I got a real estate
                         opportunity for you. Virtual real
                         estate, bro. It’s the next big
                         fuckin’ thing.

                                      PATRICK
                         Gonna be in the Dubes for a couple
                         days. Come hang. We can chat more

            about it then.
scenes.heading: INT. NIGHTCLUB - VIP LOUNGE - MOMENTS LATER

scenes.content:
HANNAH elbows her way to the front of the bar. MATT (25), a
            Chad with a fake tan, approaches.


                                      MATT
                         Wanna see something big?

                                      HANNAH
                         Gross. No.
                         Matt pulls out his COLD STORAGE
                         WALLET. Flips the digital
                         display toward HANNAH. Laughs at
                         his own joke.

                                      MATT
                         You thought I was gonna show you my
                         dick?

                                      HANNAH
                         You got me!

                                      MATT
                         This is just my party wallet.

            The numbers on the screen don’t lie; Matt’s loaded. He runs
            his hand to her waist.


                                      HANNAH
                         Wow, That’s a lot of T-Rex.

                                      MATT
                         High risk, high reward. I’m Matt.
                         She slips out of his clutches. A
                         BARTENDER approaches --

                                      HANNAH
                         Hi, Matt.

                                      BARTENDER
                         What can I get you?

                                      HANNAH
                         A bottle of Dom Perignon on Matt,
                         over here.

                                      MATT
                              (at bartender)

            You heard her.


                                      HANNAH
                         Diamond hands, huh? Isn’t that what
                         they call guys like you?

                                      MATT
                         Yeah. I’m a bit of a crypto wizard.

                                      HANNAH
                         Show me your ways, Merlin!

                                      MATT
                         What’s a girl like you need to know
                         about crypto?
                         The bartender interjects with the
                         bottle of CHAMPAGNE.

                                      HANNAH
                         I guess you’re right.
                         HANNAH shoots this piece of shit a
                         disingenuous smile and
                         takes off with the bottle of Dom
                         Perignon.
scenes.heading: INT. NIGHTCLUB - BAR - CONTINUOUS

scenes.content:
PATRICK is at the urinal, mid-stream. DANNY STANTON (25),
            bright-eyed and annoyingly eager, pulls up to the stall next
            to him. He shoots his shot, figuratively and literally.


                                      DANNY
                         PATRICK Weiss.

                                      PATRICK
                         What?

                                      DANNY
                         I just want to say how awesome it
                         is to meet you. The community
                         you’ve built, man. It’s like one
                         giant family. Hey, can I pitch you
                         an idea?

                                      PATRICK
                         No, but you’re gonna anyway...

                                      DANNY
                         Okay... So I have this super
                         original NFT project I’m working
                         on, right --

                                      PATRICK
                         Everyone at this party does, bro.

                                      DANNY
                         Yeah, but I bet they aren’t working
                         with the original cartoonist from
                         Swindler Magazine.

                                      PATRICK
                         The seventies smut mag my dad
                         jerked off to?

                                      DANNY
                         Yeah. We’re doing something
                         nobody’s done. A 10K NFT set, all
                         hand-drawn by Bob Stanton. Called
                         Acid Heads.

                                      PATRICK
                         Everybody’s done that. Who the fuck
                         is Bob Stanton?

                                      DANNY
                         The original cartoonist of
                         Swindler. My Dad!

                                      PATRICK
                         Look, unless your dad is Beeple or
                         fucking Banksy, I don’t give a
                         shit... What’s the utility? Like,
                         what does it do?
                         Danny follows PATRICK to the sink.

                                      DANNY
                         What do you mean?

                                      PATRICK
                         Are you fucking serious? it’s not
                         the pandemic, bro. NFTs are
                         utilities. They’re a part of a
                         bigger picture. A token, a

            movement, fucking proud boys, Q
            anon, I don’t give a shit, but
            something... Dude, I got Kylie
            Jenner making an appearance in less
            than half an hour ‘cause people
            want to be a part of something.
            It’s Paris Hilton. It’s branding.
            It’s VIP, bro. How the fuck did you
            get up here?
            PATRICK dries his hands.
scenes.heading: INT. MEN’S VIP BATHROOM - LATER

scenes.content:
Overlooking a back alley, HANNAH swigs Dom straight from the
            bottle. She sucks on her JUUL.
            ROGER (28), steps out onto the loading dock in the middle of
            rolling a joint. Unlike the other guys at this party, he’s
            got a vibe. ROGER can sense HANNAH’s agitated --


                                      ROGER
                         You good?

                                      HANNAH
                         Yeah, why?

                                      ROGER
                         No reason. Just asking.
                         ROGER holds the joint up.
                         ROGER (CONT’D)
                         Mind if I join you?

                                      HANNAH
                         I do, actually.

                                      ROGER
                         My bad.
                         ROGER heads to the other side of
                         the loading dock. Sparks up.

                                      HANNAH
                         You a Sad Clown holder?

                                      ROGER
                         A what?

                                      HANNAH
                         Sad Clown NFT? The next social
                         media platform exclusively on
                         blockchain... This party.

                                      ROGER
                         Oh, right. Nah.
                         ROGER turns the back of his BOMBER
                         JACKET toward HANNAH. The
                         word SECURITY is emblazoned in bold
                         yellow.

                                      HANNAH
                         Got it.

                                      ROGER
                         Dumb name. Sad Clown? Like, who the
                         hell comes up with this shit?

                                      HANNAH
                         White dudes who listen to Drake.
                         The whole thing is one big fucking
                         grift. It’ll rug pull in a month.

                                      ROGER
                         Wait, it’s not the next big thing
                         about to conquer society?
                         HANNAH motions to a group of drunk
                         CRYPTO BROS stumbling down
                         the alleyway.

                                      HANNAH
                         Like, why can’t you all just be
                         normal?

                                      ROGER
                         Maybe you’re hanging out with the
                         wrong dudes.
                         Touché... HANNAH takes a pull off
                         her JUUL.
                         ROGER (CONT’D)
                         Anything happens in there, just say
                         the word, and I’ll go bounce their
                         ass out.

                                      HANNAH
                         I’m chill. Appreciate the offer.

                                      ROGER
                         The Discord dweebs at this party
                         look like they’re gonna light shit
                         up like some tiki torch parade.

                                      HANNAH
                         Incel circle jerk, for real.
                         ROGER hands the joint to HANNAH.
                         She takes a deep drag.
                         Passes it back. ROGER takes a hit
                         --

                                      ROGER
                         Yo, I could write an essay about
                         why men suck. Generational toxic
                         masculine trauma, for one.

                                      HANNAH
                         Blame it on the Boomers.

                                      ROGER
                         When are they gonna die already?

                                      HANNAH
                         Seriously. Climate-denying
                         octogenarian non-recyclers... I’m
                         HANNAH by the way.
                         HANNAH hands ROGER the bottle of
                         Dom Perignon.

                                      ROGER
                         I’m ROGER. Never drank Dom before.

                                      HANNAH
                         Korbel for rich twats.
                         ROGER swigs off the bottle of
                         bubbly. Hands it back --

                                      ROGER
                         It ain’t André... So you’re in this
                         Crypto game, huh?

                                      HANNAH
                         Sort of... A 401k, pension, all
                         those twentieth-century ideas are
                         dead. As I see it, you’re either a
                         techno-overlord or a serf...
                              (MMOORREE)

            HANNAH (CCOONNTT’’DD)
            I can make more on these jerk-offs,
            pump-n-dumps, than I would in the
            stock market.


                                      ROGER
                         I don’t really think about it.

                                      HANNAH
                         Maybe you should.

                                      ROGER
                         I don't think about it 'cause I
                         can't afford to think about it.
                         shackled by a college degree, I’ll
                         never use. Indebted to the Techno-
                         overlords, as you call them.

                                      HANNAH
                         Can’t beat em, join em... Then beat
                         em down.
                         ROGER’s phone buzzes.

                                      ROGER

            Shit. I gotta get back to the door.

            HANNAH grabs ROGER’s phone. Plugs in her number and texts
            herself.


                                      HANNAH
                         DM me.
                         HANNAH tucks ROGER’s phone back
                         into his pants pocket. Her
                         hand stays a tad too long. She can
                         feel him getting hard.
                         HANNAH (CONT’D)
                         Hey, can you do me a favor?
                         HANNAH takes a pull off her JUUL.
scenes.heading: EXT. NIGHT CLUB - LOADING DOCK - LATER

scenes.content:
CLUBGOERS clamor to get past the BOUNCER. ROGER ushers HANNAH
            to the front of the line. Raises the red velvet rope.
scenes.heading: INT. NIGHTCLUB - VIP LOUNGE ENTRANCE - LATER
